title: Looking to make a plat/diamond ranked team
body:
Hi guys,
Im looking for players who are dedicated in competitive plays and is willing to improve their skills. 
I also need people who are regularly online for constant scrimming. 

Feel free to pm me if you are interested and let me know your roles. 

I mainly need mid/adc/top and support.

Cheers

replies.body: Plat 3 adc main but can fill
